snippet: Canada is looking into whether a fatal crash last June is related to the automaker’s faulty ignition switches.
abstract: Canada is looking into whether fatal crash in June 2013 is related to General Motors' defective ignition switches; of worldwide recall of 1.6 million GM cars, almost 236,000 are in Canada.
lead_paragraph: Canada is looking into whether a fatal crash last June is related to the automaker’s faulty ignition switches.

headline.main: Canada Explores G.M. Link to Accidents
headline.print_headline: Canada Explores G.M. Link to Accidents
